vārṣikau māsau goptārāv akurvan vairūpaṃ ca vairājaṃ cānuṣṭhātārau /
analyzed: vārṣikau māsau goptārau akurvan vairūpam ca vairājam ca anuṣṭhātārau

original: vārṣikāv enaṃ māsau pratīcyā diśo gopāyato
analyzed: vārṣikau enam māsau pratīcyāḥ diśaḥ gopāyataḥ

original: vairūpaṃ ca vairājaṃ cā(nu …) // see 1d PS_18,30.3
śaradau māsau goptārāv akurvañ chyaitaṃ ca naudhasaṃ cānuṣṭātārau /
analyzed: śaradau māsau goptārau akurvam śyaitam ca naudhasam ca anuṣṭātārau

original: śyaitaṃ ca naidhasaṃ cā(nu …) // see 1d PS_18,30.4
haimanau māsau goptārāv akurvan bhūmiṃ cāgniṃ cānuṣṭhātārau /
analyzed: haimanau māsau goptārau akurvan bhūmim ca agnim ca anuṣṭhātārau

original: haimanāv enaṃ māsau dhruvāyā diśo gopāyato
analyzed: haimanau enam māsau dhruvāyāḥ diśaḥ gopāyataḥ

original: śaiśirau māsau goptārāv akurvan divaṃ cādityaṃ cānuṣṭhātārau /
analyzed: śaiśirau māsau goptārau akurvan divam ca ādityam ca anuṣṭhātārau

original: śaiśirāv enaṃ māsā ūrdhvāyā diśo gopāyato
analyzed: śaiśirau enam māsau ūrdhvāyāḥ diśaḥ gopāyataḥ

original: dyauś cādityaścānu tiṣṭhato ya evaṃ veda // PS_18,30.6 (30)
analyzed: dyauḥ ca ādityaḥ ca anu tiṣṭhataḥ yaḥ evam veda

original: anuṣṭhātā(nu tiṣṭhati ya evaṃ veda) // PS_18,31.1
analyzed: anuṣṭhātā anu tiṣṭhati yaḥ evam veda

original: ugra enaṃ deva iṣvāso dhruvād antardeśād
analyzed: ugraḥ enam devaḥ iṣvāsaḥ dhruvāt antardeśāt
nuṣṭhātā anu tiṣṭhati yaḥ evam veda

original: sa dhruvān diśam anu vy acalat /
analyzed: sa dhruvān diśam anu vi acalat

original: taṃ bhūmiś cāgniś cauṣadhayaś ca vanaspatayaś ca
analyzed: tam bhūmiḥ ca agniḥ ca oṣadhayaḥ ca vanaspatayaḥ ca

original: vīrudhaś ca vānaspatyāś cānu vy acalan /
analyzed: vīrudhaḥ ca vānaspatyāḥ ca anu vi acalan

original: bhūmeś ca vai so 'gneś cauṣadhīnāṃ ca vanaspatināṃ ca
analyzed: bhūmeḥ ca vai saḥ gneḥ ca oṣadhīnām ca vanaspatinām ca

original: vīrudhāṃ ca vānaspatyānāṃ ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya (evaṃ veda) /
analyzed: vīrudhām ca vānaspatyānām ca priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: bhūmaye ca vai so 'gnaye cauṣadhibhyaś ca vanaspatibhyaś ca
analyzed: bhūmaye ca vai saḥ gnaye ca oṣadhibhyaḥ ca vanaspatibhyaḥ ca
vīrudbhyaḥ ca vānaspatyebhyaḥ ca ā vṛścate

original: ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ vrātyam upavadati // PS_18,32.1

analyzed: saḥ ūrdhvām diśam anu vi acalat

original: tam ṛtaṃ ca satyaṃ ca sūryaś ca candramāś cānu vy acalan /
analyzed: tam ṛtam ca satyam ca sūryaḥ ca candramāḥ ca anu vi acalan

original: ṛtasya ca vai sa satyasya ca sūryasya ca candramāsaś ca (…) /
analyzed: ṛtasya ca vai sa satyasya ca sūryasya ca candramāsaḥ ca

original: ṛtāya ca vai sa satyāya ca sūryāya ca candramāse ca (…) // see 1gh PS_18,32.2
analyzed: ṛtāya ca vai sa satyāya ca sūryāya ca candramāse ca
sa bṛhatīm diśam anu vi acalat

original: tam ṛcaś ca sāmāni ca yajūṃṣi ca brahma cānu vy acalan /
analyzed: tam ṛcaḥ ca sāmāni ca yajūṃṣi ca brahma ca anu vi acalan

original: ṛcāṃ ca vai sa sāmnāṃ ca yajuṣāṃ ca brahmaṇaś ca (priyaṃ dhāma …) /
analyzed: ṛcām ca vai sa sāmnām ca yajuṣām ca brahmaṇaḥ ca priyam dhāma

original: ṛgbhyaś ca vai sa sāmabhyaś ca yajurbhyaś ca brahmaṇe ca (…) // see 1gh PS_18,32.3
analyzed: ṛgbhyaḥ ca vai sa sāmabhyaḥ ca yajurbhyaḥ ca brahmaṇe ca
saḥ uttamām diśam anu vi acalat

original: tam itihāsaś ca purāṇaṃ ca gāthāś ca nārāśaṃsīścānu vy acalan /
analyzed: tam itihāsaḥ ca purāṇam ca gāthāḥ ca nārāśaṃsīḥ ca anu vi acalan

original: itihāsasya ca vai sa purāṇasya ca gāthānāṃ ca nārāśaṃsīnāṃ ca (priyaṃ …) /
analyzed: itihāsasya ca vai sa purāṇasya ca gāthānām ca nārāśaṃsīnām ca priyam

original: itihāsāya ca vai sa purāṇāya ca gāthābhyaś ca nārāśaṃsībhyaś ca (…) // see 1gh PS_18,32.4
analyzed: itihāsāya ca vai sa purāṇāya ca gāthābhyaḥ ca nārāśaṃsībhyaḥ ca

original: sa paramāṃ diśam anu vy acalat /
analyzed: sa paramām diśam anu vi acalat

original: tam ṛtavaś cārtavāś ca lokāś ca laukyāś cānu vy acalan /
analyzed: tam ṛtavaḥ ca ārtavāḥ ca lokāḥ ca laukyāḥ ca anu vi acalan

original: ṛtūnāṃ ca vai sa ārtavānāṃ ca lokānāṃ ca laukyānāṃ ca priyaṃ (dhāma …) /
analyzed: ṛtūnām ca vai saḥ ārtavānām ca lokānām ca laukyānām ca priyam dhāma

original: ṛtubhyaś ca vai sa ārtavebhyaś ca lokebhyaś ca laukyaibhyaś cā vṛścate (ya …) // PS_18,32.5
analyzed: ṛtubhyaḥ ca vai saḥ ārtavebhyaḥ ca lokebhyaḥ ca laukyaibhyaḥ ca vṛścate yaḥ

original: sokadrīcīṃ diśam anu vy acalat tato nāvartsyannamanyata /
analyzed: sa ukadrīcīm diśam anu vi acalat tatas na avartsyat amanyata

original: taṃ virāḍ anu vy acalat sarve ca devāḥ sarvāś ca devatāḥ /
analyzed: tam virāj anu vi acalat sarve ca devāḥ sarvāḥ ca devatāḥ

original: virāje ca vai sa sarveṣāṃ devānāṃ sarvāsāṃ ca devatānāṃ ca priyaṃ (…) /
analyzed: virāje ca vai sa sarveṣām devānām sarvāsām ca devatānām ca priyam

original: virāje ca vai sa sarvebhyaś ca devebhyaḥ sarvābhyaś ca devatābhya ā vṛścate (ya …) // PS_18,32.6
analyzed: virāje ca vai sa sarvebhyaḥ ca devebhyaḥ sarvābhyaḥ ca devatābhyaḥ ā vṛścate yaḥ

original: so 'nādiṣṭāṃ diśam anu vy acalat tato nāvartsyannamanyata /
analyzed: saḥ na ādiṣṭām diśam anu vi acalat tatas na avartsyan amanyata

original: taṃ dakṣiṇāgniś ca gārhapatyaś cāhavanīyaś ca yajñaś ca yajamānaś cānu vy acalan /
analyzed: tam dakṣiṇāgniḥ ca gārhapatyaḥ ca āhavanīyaḥ ca yajñaḥ ca yajamānaḥ ca anu vi acalan

original: dakṣiṇāgneś ca vai sa gārhapatyasya cāhavanīyasya yajñasya yajamānasya ca priyaṃ (dhāma …) /
analyzed: dakṣiṇāgneḥ ca vai sa gārhapatyasya ca āhavanīyasya yajñasya yajamānasya ca priyam dhāma

original: dakṣiṇāgnaye ca vai sa gārhapatyāya cāhavanīyāya ca yajñāya ca yajamanāya cā vṛścate (ya …) // PS_18,32.7
analyzed: dakṣiṇāgnaye ca vai sa gārhapatyāya ca āhavanīyāya ca yajñāya ca yajamanāya ca vṛścate yaḥ

original: taṃ ditiś caditiś ceḍā cendraṇī cānu vy acalan /
analyzed: tam ditiḥ ca ditiḥ ca iḍā ca indraṇī ca anu vi acalan

original: diteś ca vai so 'diteś ceḍāyāś cendrāṇyāś ca (priyaṃ …) /
analyzed: diteḥ ca vai saḥ diteḥ ca iḍāyāḥ ca indrāṇyāḥ ca priyam

original: ditaye ca vai so 'ditaye ceḍāyai cendrānyai cā (vṛścate …) // PS_18,32.8
analyzed: ditaye ca vai saḥ ditaye ca iḍāyai ca indrānyai ca ā vṛścate

original: taṃ prajāpatiś ca parameṣṭhī ca pitā ca pitāmahaś cānu vy acalan /
analyzed: tam prajāpatiḥ ca parameṣṭhī ca pitā ca pitāmahaḥ ca anu vi acalan

original: prajāpateś ca vai sa parameṣṭhinaś ca pituś ca pitāmahasya ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati
analyzed: prajāpateḥ ca vai sa parameṣṭhinaḥ ca pituḥ ca pitāmahasya ca priyam dhāma bhavati

original: prajāpataye ca vai sa parameṣṭhine ca pitre ca pitāmahāya cā vṛścate
analyzed: prajāpataye ca vai sa parameṣṭhine ca pitre ca pitāmahāya ca ā vṛścate

original: ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ vrātyam upavadati // PS_18,32.9 (32)
sa mahimā sadrur bhūtvāntaṃ bhūmyā agacchat samudro 'bhavat /
analyzed: sa mahimā sadruḥ bhūtvā antam bhūmyāḥ agacchat samudraḥ bhavat

original: taṃ prajāpatiś ca parameṣṭhī cāpaś ca śraddhā ca varṣaṃ ca bhūtvānu vy avartanta /
analyzed: tam prajāpatiḥ ca parameṣṭhī ca āpaḥ ca śraddhā ca varṣam ca bhūtvā anu vi avartanta

original: taṃ yajñaś ca lokaś cānnaṃ cānnādyaṃ ca bhūtvābhi pary ā vartanta /
analyzed: tam yajñaḥ ca lokaḥ ca annam ca annādyam ca bhūtvā abhi pari ā vartanta

original: ainam āpo gacchanty ainaṃ varṣaṃ gacchaty ainaṃ śraddhā gacchaty
analyzed: ā enam āpaḥ gacchanti ā enam varṣam gacchati ā enam śraddhā gacchati

original: ainaṃ dīkṣā gacchaty ainaṃ yajño gacchaty ainaṃ loko gacchaty
analyzed: ā enam dīkṣā gacchati ā enam yajñaḥ gacchati ā enam lokaḥ gacchati

original: ainam annaṃ gacchaty ainam annādyaṃ gacchati ya (evaṃ veda) // PS_18,33.1 (33)
analyzed: ā enam annam gacchati ā enam annādyam gacchati yaḥ evam veda
saḥ rajyata tasmāt rajyamānāt rājanyaḥ ajāyata

original: sa viśaḥ sabandhūn annaṃ cānnādyaṃ cābhy ud atiṣṭhata /
analyzed: sa viśaḥ sabandhūn annam ca annādyam ca abhi ud atiṣṭhata

original: viśāṃ ca vai sa sabandhūnāṃ cānnasya cānnādyasya ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya (evaṃ
analyzed: viśām ca vai sa sabandhūnām ca annasya ca annādyasya ca priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam

original: viḍbhyaś ca vai sa sabandhubhyaś cānnāya cānnādyāya cā vṛścate
analyzed: viḍbhyaḥ ca vai sa sabandhubhyaḥ ca annāya ca annādyāya ca ā vṛścate

original: ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ vrātyam upavadati // PS_18,34.1 (34)
taṃ sabhā ca samitiś ca senā ca surā cānu vy acalan /
analyzed: tam sabhā ca samitiḥ ca senā ca surā ca anu vi acalan

original: sabhāyāś ca vai sa samiteś ca senāyāś ca sūrāyāś ca sa priyaṃ
analyzed: sabhāyāḥ ca vai sa samiteḥ ca senāyāḥ ca sūrāyāḥ ca sa priyam

original: sabhāyai ca vai sa samitaye ca senāyai ca surāyai cā vṛścate
analyzed: sabhāyai ca vai sa samitaye ca senāyai ca surāyai ca ā vṛścate

original: yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātyo rājño 'tithir gṛham āgacchet /
analyzed: yasya evam vidvān vrātyaḥ rājñaḥ tithiḥ gṛham āgacchet

original: śreyāṃsam enam ātmano mānayet tathā rāṣṭrāya nā vṛścate
analyzed: śreyāṃsam enam ātmanaḥ mānayet tathā rāṣṭrāya nā vṛścate

original: tathā kṣatrāya nā vṛścate tathā brahmaṇe nā vṛścate /
analyzed: tathā kṣatrāya nā vṛścate tathā brahmaṇe nā vṛścate

original: tato vai brahma ca kṣatraṃ cod atiṣṭhatāṃ
analyzed: tatas vai brahma ca kṣatram ca ud atiṣṭhatām
te abrūtām kam pra viśāva iti

original: te prajāpatir abravīd bṛhaspatim eva brahma prāviśad indraṃ kṣatram iti /
analyzed: te prajāpatiḥ abravīt bṛhaspatim eva brahma prāviśat indram kṣatram iti

original: tato vai bṛhaspatim eva brahma prāviśad indraṃ kṣatram /
analyzed: tatas vai bṛhaspatim eva brahma prāviśat indram kṣatram

original: iyaṃ vāva bhūmir bṛhaspatir asau dyaur indraḥ /
analyzed: iyam vāva bhūmiḥ bṛhaspatiḥ asau dyauḥ indraḥ
ayam vāva agniḥ brahma asau ādityaḥ kṣatram

original: ainaṃ kṣatraṃ gacchatīndrayāvī bhavati ya ādityaṃ kṣatraṃ divam indraṃ veda /
analyzed: ā enam kṣatram gacchati indra yāvī bhavati yaḥ ādityam kṣatram divam indram veda
ā enam brahma gacchati brāhmaṇa varcasī bhavati

original: yo 'gniṃ brahma bṛhaspatiṃ bhūmiṃ veda // PS_18,36.1 (36)
analyzed: yaḥ gnim brahma bṛhaspatim bhūmim veda

original: yasyoddhṛteṣv agniṣv ahute agnihotra evaṃ vidvān vrātyo 'tithiḥ /
analyzed: yasya uddhṛteṣu agniṣu a hute agnihotre evam vidvān vrātyo tithiḥ

analyzed: vrātya kva avātsīḥ iti vrātyaḥ dakam iti vrātya tarpayantu iti

original: yad āha vrātya kvāvātsīr iti patha eva tena devayānān ava rundhe / Bhatt. itī
analyzed: yat āha vrātya kva avātsīḥ iti pathaḥ eva tena deva yānān ava rundhe

original: (yad āha) vrātyodakam ity apa eva tenāva rundhe /
analyzed: yat āha vrātya udakam iti apaḥ eva tena ava rundhe

original: yad āha vrātya tarpayantv iti prāṇam eva tena
analyzed: yat āha vrātya tarpayantu iti prāṇam eva tena

original: vrātya yathā te priyaṃ tathāstv iti
analyzed: vrātya yathā te priyam tathā astu iti

original: vrātya yathā te nikāmas tathāstv iti
analyzed: vrātya yathā te nikāmaḥ tathā astu iti

original: vrātya yathā te vaśastathāstv iti // PS_18,37.3
analyzed: vrātya yathā te vaśaḥ tathā astu iti

original: yad āha vrātya yathā te priyaṃ tathāstv iti
analyzed: yat āha vrātya yathā te priyam tathā astu iti

original: priyam eva tenāva rundhe priye priyasya bhavaty
analyzed: priyam eva tena ava rundhe priye priyasya bhavati

original: ainaṃ priyaṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda // PS_18,37.4
analyzed: ā enam priyam gacchati yaḥ evam veda

original: te nikāmas tathāstv iti nikāmam eva tenāva rundhe
analyzed: te nikāmaḥ tathā astu iti nikāmam eva tena ava rundhe

analyzed: nikāme nikāmam asya bhavati ā enam nikāmaḥ gacchati yaḥ evam veda

original: yad āha vrātya yathā te vaśas tathāstv iti
analyzed: yat āha vrātya yathā te vaśaḥ tathā astu iti

original: vaśam eva tenāva rundhe vaśī vaśasya bhavaty
analyzed: vaśam eva tena ava rundhe vaśī vaśasya bhavati

original: ainaṃ vaśo gacchati ya evaṃ veda // PS_18,37.5 (37)
analyzed: ā enam vaśaḥ gacchati yaḥ evam veda  /

original: yasyādhiśrite agnihotra evaṃ vidvān vrātyo 'tithir gṛham āgacchet /
analyzed: yasya adhiśrite agnihotre evam vidvān vrātyo tithiḥ gṛham āgacchet

original: svayam enam abhyudetya brūyād vrātyāti sṛja hoṣyāmīti /
analyzed: svayam enam abhyudetya brūyāt vrātya ati sṛja hoṣyāmi iti

original: ati ca sṛjej juhūyān na cātisṛjen na juhūyāt /
analyzed: ati ca sṛjet juhūyāt na ca atisṛjet na juhūyāt

original: yo vā evaṃ viduṣā vrātyenānatisṛṣṭo juhoti /
analyzed: yaḥ vai evam viduṣā vrātyena an atisṛṣṭaḥ juhoti

original: na devayānaṃ panthāṃ pra jānāti na pitṛyāṇam
analyzed: na deva yānam panthām pra jānāti na pitṛyāṇam
ā deveṣu vṛścate hutam asya bhavati

original: yo vā evaṃ viduṣā vrātyenānatisṛṣṭo juhoti /
analyzed: yaḥ vai evam viduṣā vrātyena an atisṛṣṭaḥ juhoti

original: pra devayānaṃ panthāṃ jānāti pra pitṛyānaṃ
analyzed: pra deva yānam panthām jānāti pra pitṛ yānam

original: pary asyāsmim̐l loka āyatanaṃ śiṣyate hutam asya bhavati // PS_18,38.1 (38)
analyzed: pari asya asmin loke āyatanam śiṣyate hutam asya bhavati  /

original: yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātya ekāṃ rātrim atithir gṛhe vasati /
analyzed: yasya evam vidvān vrātyaḥ ekām rātrim atithiḥ gṛhe vasati

original: ye pṛthivyāṃ puṇyā lokās tān evainenāva rundhe // PS_18,39.1
analyzed: ye pṛthivyām puṇyāḥ lokāḥ tān eva enena ava rundhe

original: ye antarikṣe puṇyā lokās (tān evainenāva rundhe) // PS_18,39.2
analyzed: ye antarikṣe puṇyāḥ lokāḥ tān eva enena ava rundhe
vrātyaḥ tṛtīyām rātrim atithiḥ gṛhe vasati

original: ye divi puṇyā lokās (tān evainenāva rundhe) // PS_18,39.3
analyzed: ye divi puṇyāḥ lokāḥ tān eva enena ava rundhe
vrātyaḥ catūrthīm rātrim ātithiḥ gṛhe vasati

original: sarvān evainena puṇyām̐l lokān ava rundhe // PS_18,39.4
analyzed: sarvān eva enena puṇyāml lokān ava rundhe
vrātyaḥ pañcamīm rātrim atithiḥ gṛhe vasati
parāvataḥ eva enena lokān ava rundhe

original: yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātyo 'parimitā rātrīr atithir gṛhe vasati /
analyzed: yasya evam vidvān vrātyo parimitāḥ rātrīḥ atithiḥ gṛhe vasati

original: aparimitān evainena lokān ava rundhe // PS_18,39.6 (39)
analyzed: aparimitān eva enena lokān ava rundhe  /

original: yasyāvrātyo vrātyabruvo nāmabibhratī gṛhān atithir āgacchet /
analyzed: yasya avrātyaḥ vrātyabruvaḥ nāma bibhratī gṛhān atithiḥ āgacchet
karṣet enam na ca enam karṣet

original: etasyai devatāyā udakaṃ yācāmīty asmā udakaṃ yācet /
analyzed: etasyai devatāyai udakam yācāmi iti asmai udakam yācet

original: etāṃ devatāṃ pari veveṣmīty enaṃ pari veveṣyāt /
analyzed: etām devatām pari veveṣmi iti enam pari veveṣyāt

original: etasyām evāsya devatāyāṃ hutam iṣṭaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda // PS_18,40.1 (40)
analyzed: etasyām eva asya devatāyām hutam iṣṭam bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: indro bhūtvānu vy acalan mano 'nnādaṃ kṛtvā /
analyzed: indraḥ bhūtvā anu vi acalat manaḥ nna ādam kṛtvā
manasā anna ādena annam atti yaḥ evam veda

original: mārutaṃ śardho bhūtvānu vy acalan manyum annādaṃ kṛtvā /
analyzed: mārutam śardhaḥ bhūtvā anu vi acalat manyum anna ādam kṛtvā
manyunā anna ādena annam atti yaḥ evam veda

original: varuṇo bhūtvānu vy acalad apo 'nnādīḥ kṛtvā /
analyzed: varuṇaḥ bhūtvā anu vi acalat apaḥ nnādīḥ kṛtvā
